entry.title: Block Size Increase
entry.summary: Jeff Garzik, a Bitcoin core developer and open source evangelist, sent an email to his list stating that his emails are being marked as spam despite being sent from GMail's web interface. He mentioned that he has contacted the sysadmin regarding this issue. Jeff is associated with BitPay, Inc., which is a payment processor for Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies. The link to their website is provided in the email signature.
